alert.note: Alert for Camden; Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 12 at 4:56PM EDT until March 12 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 67 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST FLORIDA BAKER DUVAL NASSAU IN NORTHERN FLORIDA COLUMBIA HAMILTON SUWANNEE IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST GEORGIA CAMDEN CHARLTON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMELIA CITY, ARLINGTON, BELMONT, COLUMBIA, DOVER BLUFF, DUNGENESS, FERNANDINA BEACH, FOLKSTON, HILLIARD, HOMELAND, HOUSTON, JACKSONVILLE, JASPER, JENNINGS, KINGS FERRY, KINGSLAND, LAKE CITY, LIVE OAK, LULU, MACCLENNY, MCALPIN, NEWBURN, NORMANDY, OCEANWAY, OLENO STATE PARK, OLUSTEE, ORTEGA, RACE POND, RATLIFF, RIVERSIDE, SAN MARCO, ST. GEORGE, STEPHEN FOSTER STATE PARK, SUWANNEE SPRINGS, WATERTOWN, WEST LAKE, WHITE SPRINGS, WINOKUR, AND YULEE.
